item.title: Natural-gas prices see biggest jump in more than 2 years, leading oil higher
item.description: Natural-gas prices soared on Monday, on track for their biggest jump in more than two years, as traders braced for colder temperatures in the U.S. and Europe.

item.title: Jimmy Carter, the farmer, president and Nobel peace crusader, dies at age 100
item.description: Jimmy Carter, the nation's 39th president, lived longer than any other occupant of the Oval Office.

item.title: European markets fall in last full trading day of 2024
item.description: European markets traded in negative territory on Monday, in what will be the region's final full trading session of the year.

item.title: Jimmy Carter quotes: 'I could have wiped Iran off the map'
item.description: "I could have wiped Iran off the map," Jimmy Carter told CNBC in 2014. Memorable quotes from the 39th president.

item.title: German politicians decry Elon Musk's AfD support as 'intrusive' election influence
item.description: German politicians from the government and opposition on Sunday called an opinion piece Musk wrote backing the right-wing AfD as "intrusive" outside influence.
